title: Polemica: Chaos and drama as Adriatica Ionica three-day canceled 16 hours before start
content:
Organizers and Italian Professional Cycling League get into blame game as 16 teams turn up for Adriatica Ionica Race only to find out it has been canceled.

Read the full article at Polemica: Chaos and drama as Adriatica Ionica three-day canceled 16 hours before start on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
